channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: TMC - Defects - Vegetation problem, 7th October
item.description:
Road closure 28 day please cut back overgrown brambles hanging over carriageway back to boundary approximately 4 metres high by 20 metres in length (Overgrown Hedge)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Covers, Gratings & Frames problem, 7th October
item.description:
Hole at side of chamber in hours 2hr emergency make safe with 3 Barriers. Give and Take TM Outside number 20 (Broken Chamber Cover/Frame)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Other FW6 Surface problem, 7th October
